statements: SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donor_name = 'Alice';
SELECT donation_amount FROM donations WHERE aid_type = 'Medical';
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount >= 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT donation_id, aid_type FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, aid_type FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT AVG(donation_amount) AS avg_donation_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_donations FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation_amount FROM donations GROUP BY donor_name ORDER BY total_donation_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT distribution_id, recipient_name, aid_type, aid_amount, distribution_date FROM aid_distribution;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount <= 500 ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT recipient_name, aid_type, aid_amount FROM aid_distribution WHERE aid_type = 'Medical' ORDER BY aid_amount ASC;

SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date, recipient_name, aid_type, aid_amount FROM donations JOIN aid_distribution ON donations.donation_id = aid_distribution.distribution_id WHERE donation_amount > 5000 ORDER BY aid_amount DESC, donation_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM aid_distribution WHERE aid_type = 'Food';
SELECT aid_receiver_name, distribution_amount FROM aid_distribution ORDER BY distribution_date DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_quantity, resource_type FROM resources WHERE resource_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY donation_amount ASC;
SELECT aid_receiver_name, SUM(distribution_amount) AS total_amount FROM aid_distribution GROUP BY aid_receiver_name HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_quantity FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'food' AND resource_quantity < 50 ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, DATE_FORMAT(donation_date, '%M %e, %Y') AS formatted_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 500;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT recipient_name, aid_amount, distribution_date FROM aid_distribution ORDER BY aid_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_purpose FROM donations WHERE donation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 5000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_purpose FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT recipient_name, SUM(aid_amount) AS total_aid FROM aid_distribution GROUP BY recipient_name HAVING total_aid > 10000 ORDER BY total_aid DESC;
SELECT donor_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_name = donations.donor_name ORDER BY donors.donor_name DESC, donations.donation_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_name = 'Alice' AND donation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT recipient_name, location FROM recipients WHERE location LIKE '%tow%';
SELECT center_name, contact_person FROM distribution_centers ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT donor_name, amount FROM donations WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT d.id, d.donor_name, dc.category_name FROM donations d INNER JOIN donation_categories dc ON d.id = dc.category_id
SELECT * FROM recipients r LEFT JOIN distribution_history dh ON r.recipient_id = dh.recipient_id WHERE dh.quantity > 100
SELECT recipient_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM recipients r INNER JOIN distribution_history dh ON r.recipient_id = dh.recipient_id GROUP BY recipient_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
